title: Could have been a great film!
review: First Man could have been at least as good or better than Appolo 13 or The Right Stuffs.But a bad and uninspiring script and dark filming style killed First Man!Actually, I enjoyed watching the behind the scenes on the first man dvd more than the movie itself.

title: Could have been a great film about WWI
review:
I must say that I was dissapointed in watching 1917
because it could have been a great film about WWI.The problem with the film 1917 is that its gimmicky story telling and surreal filming style distract and got in the way of telling the horrors of wars!1917 could have been as good as Platoon, Apocalype Now & Schindler's List.

title: Good, Dark Comedy! But Not Worthy of Oscar Best Picture
review: Parasite is a good, dark, comedy.But it's not worthy of Oscar Best Picture.

title: I understand why Green Book won Oscar Best Picture
review: After watching Green Book, I understand why Green Book won Oscar Best Picture: it's a great story about discrimination, the human condition & true friendship!Congratulation to Green Book!
